page.title: 09GLOSSOPDALE LEISURE-TIME
page.content: We carried out a {survey}in Glossop to gather information about how people use their{freetime.}We arrived at{ {11am.}and interviewed until{1pm.} During this time people came out of work and many of them came into the square for their lunch. This gave us the{variety}we wanted for our survey. We{interviewed}people of different ages and with different jobs, a{total} of 436 people-{142 females,294 males.} The most{popular pastime}was watching Tv, but most people enjoyed some {active form of recreation. We asked them if they did any of the following: sport(eg. football,squash) watching Tv: Bingo: Do-it-yourself:and gardening. We found a large percentage played some sport, often in the{ {Leisure Centre}or with a{Club.} Sadly we found few people who used the {Adult Centre for Recreation & Learning
